00024 #ifndef __WORKER_THREAD_H__
00025 #define __WORKER_THREAD_H__
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "sys/Thread.h"
00029 #include "mt/RequestQueue.h"
00030 
00031 
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace mt
00035 {
00046 template <typename Request_T> class WorkerThread : public sys::Thread
00047 {
00048 public:
00050     WorkerThread(mt::RequestQueue<Request_T>* requestQueue) :
00051             mRequestQueue(requestQueue), mDone(false)
00052     {}
00053 
00057     virtual ~WorkerThread()
00058     {}
00059 
00060     virtual void initialize()
00061     {}
00065     virtual void run()
00066     {
00067         initialize();
00068         while (!isDone())
00069         {
00070             // Pull a runnable off the queue
00071             Request_T req;
00072             mRequestQueue->dequeue(req);
00073             performTask(req);
00074         }
00075     }
00076     virtual bool isDone() const
00077     {
00078         return mDone;
00079     }
00080     virtual void setDone()
00081     {
00082         mDone = true;
00083     }
00090     virtual void performTask(Request_T& request) = 0;
00091 
00097     std::string getThreadId()
00098     {
00099         std::ostringstream oss;
00100 #ifdef __POSIX
00101         pthread_t self = this->getNative();
00102         oss << (long)self;
00103 #else
00104 #    ifdef WIN32
00105         HANDLE self = this->getNative();
00106         oss << GetCurrentThreadId();
00107 #    else
00108         oss << this->getName();
00109 #    endif
00110 #endif
00111         return oss.str();
00112 
00113     }
00114 protected:
00115 
00116     mt::RequestQueue<Request_T> *mRequestQueue;
00117     bool mDone;
00118 };
00119 }
00120 
00121 #endif
